Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"

 Thank you Dra, I still have many other's I did it on the first day the Ann=
ie became missing, I called police on the second day they found her body ab=
out 8 or 9 days later in a wall at the science tech area of the school, I l=
et the police hear all my files, but of course police thought I was in some=
 bar and all the people were talking about the missing girl.=C2=A0 The cop =
on the line said, "well, it's only been one day, and we hope we find her al=
ive."=C2=A0 Just what he said, so I did feel badly because spirit told them=
 she was already dead.=C2=A0 I'm glad i saved all the files, i have even th=
e originals too. that was before i knew how to change them to mp so they ar=
e still in wav format.=C2=A0 This is the real thing people, and it's not on=
ly Coke either! sf

 



-----Original Message-----
From: draiga1 <mail@=
mysticcauldron.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sat, Jul 10, 2010 =
11:27 am
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Last nights files,

          =C2=A0       =
                           Snow,
 
 Those are amazing files! You have menti=
oned them before but this is the first time I got to hear them. Thanks for =
posting them again. I wasn't around last year when that happened.
 
 ~Draig=
a
 
 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
 >
 > Ok, h=
ere is your "evidence" RJ, last year in spring a  girl was killed, her 
 &g=
t; name was Annie Le, back then i was new to this but, got  some great file=
s, 
 > which i gave let police hear on DAY  ONE of her being only still =
missing.  
 > Even in the files themselves  some spirits are telling me =
she is dead, her 
 > voice came through, I have tons of  them, these are=
 a few, and yes I left what 
 > they say on them, some are clearer  then=
 others, and if the police officer 
 > was able to hear them, you should=
 be  able to as well. I don't know why i 
 > even bother to worry my hea=
d over doubters  anyway.  I posted these to all 
 > three lists, because=
 Bruce can  verify what happened  back then too.   You will 
 > also  fi=
nd that the files themselves verify this by the questions asked of  
 > =
them.   Enjoy,  sf 
 >  
 
 
      
                 
   
       
  


----------MB_8CCEE65BCAA6EA3_1070_11EAF_webmail-d100.sysops.aol.com
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8"


<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> Thank y=
ou Dra, I still have many other's I did it on the first day the Annie becam=
e missing, I called police on the second day they found her body about 8 or=
 9 days later in a wall at the science tech area of the school, I let the p=
olice hear all my files, but of course police thought I was in some bar and=
 all the people were talking about the missing girl.  The cop on the l=
ine said, "well, it's only been one day, and we hope we find her alive."&nb=
sp; Just what he said, so I did feel badly because spirit told them she was=
 already dead.  I'm glad i saved all the files, i have even the origin=
als too. that was before i knew how to change them to mp so they are still =
in wav format.  This is the real thing people, and it's not only Coke =
either! sf<br>
</div>

<div> <br>
</div>

</div>
